Sebastian Arcelus is an American voice actor who works on the properties of 4Kids Entertainment and NYAV Post. He has also made a career in theatre, being featured in "Rent" on Broadway, first as Roger and then as a swing, covering the male ensemble roles as well as Mark and Roger. He also starred as Jan in the original cast of the unsuccessful musical "Good Vibrations". Arcelus then played the part of Fiyero on the US national tour of "Wicked" in 2006. He recently reprised that role in the musical's Broadway production. He played his final performance as Fiyero on December 16, 2007. He is currently starring as Bob Gaudio in the Broadway production of "Jersey Boys". He began his run on January 10, 2008. [http://www.broadwayworld.com/viewcolumn.cfm?colid=23683]

Sebastian's grandmother was Princess Ekaterina Ioannovna of Russia, daughter of Prince Ioann Konstantinovich of Russia, and the last member of the Romanov family born before the Revolution. Princess Ekaterina died in 2007

Voice roles

* "Samurai Deeper Kyo" - Hotaru

* "Shaman King" - Yoh Asakura / Zeke Asakura (Hao Asakura)

* "Dinosaur King" - Rex Owen

* "Yu-Gi-Oh!" - Rex Raptor (Dinosaur Ryuzaki) (episodes 145-184)

* "Shrine of the Morning Mist" - Tadahiro Amatsu

* "Ultimate Muscle" - Road Rage / Additional Voices

* "Winx Club" (4Kids Entertainment edit) - Timmy/Palladium

* "" - Rafe

* "Pokémon Chronicles" - Additional Voices

* "Yu-Gi-Oh! GX" - Marcel (Martin Kanou)

* " Man of the People" - Little G / Miscellaneous

Other projects

Sebastian is currently featured on I Channel, an interactive "story told in snippets" of "a self-conscious young man who finds his life taken over by a video blog." He plays I's brother, who frequently calls or visits. [http://www.connectwithi.com/ View I Channel here] .

He's also recently been featured on I Channel's "behind the scenes" blog, providing vlogs as I's brother, who is a little technologically handicapped. | [http://ichannelblog.blogspot.com/search/label/Big%20Brother%20Blog Big Brother Blog at blogspot.com]
